product_name: Outdoor Research Radar Pocket Cap - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The street-styled Outdoor Research Radar Pocket Cap shields you from the sun with UPF 30 protection and stores away in your pocket with the help of the folding brim. Breathable, lightweight Supplex(R) nylon hat is great for travel; short folding brim pops back into shape when you pull it out of your pocket. Polyester headband wicks moisture to keep you comfortable. Outdoor Research Radar Pocket Cap packs down small, fits men and women, and weighs only 1.8 oz. Closeout.
short_description: The street-styled Outdoor Research Radar Pocket Cap shields you from the sun with UPF 30 protection and stores away in your pocket with the help of the folding brim.
